收起条件∧
展开代码 <form id="formLessSearch"> <div class="search-area"> <div class="search-group"> <label>帐号：</label> <input class="form-control" name="Code" type="text" maxlength="30"> </div> <div class="search-group"> <label>性别：</label> <select class="form-control"> <option selected="selected">请选择</option> <option>男</option> <option>女</option> </select> </div> <div class="search-group"> <label>职位：</label> <select class="form-control"> <option selected="selected">销售总监</option> <option>客户经理</option> <option>渠道经理</option> <option>人事主管</option> <option>产品经理</option> <option>java开发工程师</option> <option>财务人员</option> </select> </div> </div> <div class="search-group"> <button class="btn btn-primary" type="button" onclick="refreshDatas()">查询</button> <a class="more-criteria" href="javascript:moreConditions()">更多条件∨</a> </div> </form> <form id="formMoreSearch" class="form-horizontal"> <div class="search-area"> <div class="search-group"> <label>帐号：</label> <input class="form-control" name="Code" type="text" maxlength="30"> </div> <div class="search-group"> <label>性别：</label> <select class="form-control"> <option selected="selected">请选择</option> <option>男</option> <option>女</option> </select> </div> <div class="search-group"> <label>职位：</label> <select class="form-control"> <option selected="selected">销售总监</option> <option>客户经理</option> <option>渠道经理</option> <option>人事主管</option> <option>产品经理</option> <option>java开发工程师</option> <option>财务人员</option> </select> </div> <div class="search-group"> <label>入职时间：</label> <input type="text" class="form-control" id="datepicker"> </div> <div class="search-group"> <label>年龄：</label> <input type="text" class="form-control" value=""> </div> </div> <div class="search-group"> <button class="btn btn-primary" type="button" onclick="refreshDatas()">查询</button> <a id="linkLess" class="close-criteria" href="javascript:lessConditions()">收起条件∧</a> </div> </form> <script type="text/javascript"> //较少的条件 function lessConditions() { $("#formMoreSearch").animate({ height: "50px" }, function() { $(this).css("height", "0"); $("#formLessSearch").show(); }); } //较多的条件 function moreConditions() { var formMoreSearchH = $("#formMoreSearch .search-area").height(); $("#formLessSearch").hide(); $("#formMoreSearch").show().css("height", "50px").animate({ height: formMoreSearchH }); } </script>
